Package estgconstroi

Interface ConstructionSite

public interface ConstructionSite

Escola Superior de Tecnologia e Gestão (ESTG) | Politécnico do Porto (PP)
Licenciatura em Engenharia Informática (LEI) e Licenciatura em Segurança Informática em Redes de Computadores (LSIRC)
Paradigmas de Programação (PP) - 2021/2022

The ConstructionSite interface provides the methods for a construction site.

    • setResponsible

      void setResponsible(Employee employee) throws ConstructionSiteException
      Sets the responsible for the construction site.
      Parameters:
      employee - the responsible employee
      Throws:
      ConstructionSiteException - if the employee is not a Manager.

    • addTeam

      void addTeam(Team team) throws ConstructionSiteException
      Adds a team to the construction site.
      Parameters:
      team - The team to be added.
      Throws:
      ConstructionSiteException - if the team is already in the construction site.

    • removeTeam

      void removeTeam(Team team) throws ConstructionSiteException
      Removes a team from the construction site.
      Parameters:
      team - The team to be removed.
      Throws:
      ConstructionSiteException - if the team is not in the construction site.

    • getTeams

      Team[] getTeams(String name)
      Returns the teams of the construction site with the given name.

      the teams of the construction site with the given name.

    • getTeams

      Team[] getTeams()
      Returns the teams of the construction site.
      Returns:
      the teams of the construction site.

    • isValid

      boolean isValid()
      Verifies if the construction site is valid. To be valid the following conditions must be met:
      • The responsible for the construction site must be a Manager.
      • At least on team must be present
      • All teams must have a Team leader TEAM_LEADER
      • At least one equipment must be present with a status of Operative
      • The permit expiration date must the lower then construction site operacional period (start date and end date)
      Returns:
      true if the construction site is valid, false otherwise.

    • getEquipments

      Equipments getEquipments()
      Returns the equipments
      Returns:
      the equipments
